text:
Message 3610 of 4024
Christ , what a tough montage to see now that July 4th means something so much different. It was our day! Big tent, happy times. I always look at
you now and wonder. I had so much faith, trust, devotion.
What a fucking fool I was to put my faith in you.
And I did right after you had just jettisoned Leo.
I deserve exactly what I got for being so stupid.
Sent:07/11/2024 at 08:45 PM
From:Robert Moyer
To:Christine Moyer (First Viewed: 07/12/2024 at 05:01 PM)
Subject:July 4th
Attachments:IMG_1605.PNG (12 MB)
Message 3611 of 4024
Apologies for my frustration. I want you to know that I am going to do my level best to keep my heartbreak  to myself. I can only hope you realize
that I felt like I won the lottery when I met you.
And I thought we had turned the corner. I was the man you asked me to be. And by making the changes you asked me for, would grow old together. I
just never imagined this was even possible.
I miss my best friend dearly. I always will...
Sent:07/12/2024 at 12:40 PM
From:Robert Moyer
To:Christine Moyer (First Viewed: 07/12/2024 at 05:01 PM)
Subject:Re: July 4th
Message 3612 of 4024
I’d like to start over here. I’d like us to use the platform to deescalate rather than entrench and become even more estranged and acrimonious.
Wanna give it a shot?
Sent:07/12/2024 at 12:58 PM
From:Robert Moyer
To:Christine Moyer (First Viewed: 07/12/2024 at 05:01 PM)
Subject:OFW Reset
Attachments:IMG_1608.jpg (4 MB)
Message 3613 of 4024
Or are we never talking again? We know what got us here, so my hope is you don’t double down. Isn’t it time to try and find a peaceful way to
coexist?
Sent:07/12/2024 at 05:39 PM
From:Robert Moyer
To:Christine Moyer (First Viewed: 07/13/2024 at 06:17 AM)
Subject:Are you going to reply?
